job.title: Principal Scientist / Associate Director, Molecular Biology
job.description: We invent and create multi domain proteins for cell and gene therapies including genome editors and CARs By coupling synthetic biology with data science and machine learning we are able to generate highscale protein libraries for highthroughput screening and analysisbrbrThis position is based in San Francisco CA We are actively looking to hire a Principal Scientist  Associate Director Molecular Biology This person will help contribute towards building out and deploying our highthroughput methods to characterize and develop cutting edge therapies for immunooncologybrbrTop
